body_text: I think I tried that originally but then it didn't make sense to have state.app.experiments.experiments rather than state.app.experiments.items.experiments.  It seemed like to be consistent with the rest of the application, I should name space my whole state into something called 'items', which I think @rehandalal recommended?
body: I think I tried that originally but then it didn't make sense to have state.app.experiments.experiments rather than state.app.experiments.items.experiments.  It seemed like to be consistent with the rest of the application, I should name space my whole state into something called 'items', which I think @rehandalal recommended?
